SEARCH
Package com.dimon.managers

Class FragmentManager

java.lang.Object
com.dimon.managers.FragmentManager
public class FragmentManager extends Object
Manages the state and operations of UDP fragments during transmission. This class tracks pending fragments, acknowledgments, sequence numbers, and other metadata required for reliable fragment management in the protocol.

    Decrements the window counter to reflect a processed fragment.

    Marks the header as sent and logs the action.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the state of the fragment manager, clearing all tracked data and resetting counters and flags to their initial values.

    • clearPendingFragments

      public void clearPendingFragments(int seqNumber)
      Removes a fragment from the pending queue based on its sequence number.
      Parameters:
      seqNumber - the sequence number of the fragment to be removed.

    • addFragment

      public void addFragment(MyUDPProtocol fragment, long sendTime)
      Adds a fragment to the pending queue and records its send timestamp.
      Parameters:
      fragment - the fragment to be added.
      sendTime - the timestamp when the fragment was sent.

    • updateMinFragmentSize

      public void updateMinFragmentSize(int fragmentLength)
      Updates the minimum fragment size if the provided fragment is smaller.
      Parameters:
      fragmentLength - the length of the fragment to compare.

    • decrementWindowCounter

      public void decrementWindowCounter()
      Decrements the window counter to reflect a processed fragment.

    • canSendMoreFragments

      public boolean canSendMoreFragments()
      Checks whether more fragments can be sent based on the current window size.
      Returns:
      true if more fragments can be sent; false otherwise.

    • markHeaderAsSent

      public void markHeaderAsSent()
      Marks the header as sent and logs the action.
